page.title: 20HOUSES
page.content: Most of the houses in the main street of Gordon are quite old. Some have stones with the date inscribed on them. The Gordon post office was built in 1851 and is still the original building. A bit of the building was called the Post Office Close. It is used for a storeroom now. The post office is about the middle of the main street. Glebe Park is mainly a housing area which is situated next to the road as you come in from the Edinburgh side. Glebe Park is fairly new because it was built within the last ten years. Most of the houses in Glebe Park are semi-detatched. They are mostly centrally heated but some are not. The houses have small gardens front and back. there are no shops at all in Glebe Park.
